ygData.subject: Re: Rune Sword
ygData.msgSnippet: I would greatly appreciate any info.  I am not happy with my current weapons, and the weapons that I want are far out of my reach. Bael Warrior of the Indigo
ygData.messageBody:
I would greatly appreciate any info. I am not happy with my current weapons, and the weapons that I want are far out of my reach.

Bael
Warrior of the Indigo Brotherhood

-----Original Message-----
From: Elena Glenn <braveheart@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 11:07 AM
Subject: [warriors_eq] Rune Sword


Tom, I am ashamed to say that the sword was a gift from a dear friend, and I just equipped it and walked out to battle when I was killed. I was in such a state of shock to find it gone, that I forgot the stats and went a little "nuts". I will find out for you, and get back on this. But I still want to know, "WHAT HAPPENED TO MY SWORD"? LOL

Leri
